t: How To Get Amazon's Choice Badge | Trellis
s: September 19, 2024 - Getting an Amazon’s Choice label is a great way to establish credibility and appeal to shoppers, as well as drive sales and rack up reviews. This is how to get the Amazon’s Choice badge—and what you can do to keep it. ... An Amazon’s Choice badge is a way to indicate products Amazon’s algorithms determine are the best purchase decision for a particular category.
